77a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa da ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
77a5('bum): bsgom pa'o// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyom sa par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas
77a6('bum): skye mched kyi snyom par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
77a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
77a8('bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ba'o/ 
77b1('bum): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/ 
77b2('bum): pa'o// gtong ba rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
77b3('bum): skye ba rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbug phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
77b4('bum): po bsgom pa'o// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom dpa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam pa rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
77b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi rtag pa'i 'dushes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam
77b6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi sdug pa'i
77b7('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
77b8('bum): bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
78a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
78a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shre
78a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam
78a5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ 
78a6('bum): shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
78a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
78a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
78b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
78b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
78b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rna par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
78b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam rnam par bsgom pa dbasgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
78b5('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// smon pa med pa'i
78b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
78b7('bum): pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
78b8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
79a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa
79a2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog
79a3('bum): pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79a4('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa/ bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// / kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
79a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
79a6('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgo/ 
79a7('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rjesu 'gro ba shes pa rnam par
79a8('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dris pa
79b1('bum): shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
79b2('bum): bsgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
79b3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ she
79b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha da rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79b5('bum): parnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
79b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid sto
79b7('bum): pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don dam pa
79b8('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus
80a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80a2('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
80a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
80a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam dpar bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
80a5('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med/ pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam
80a6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mngon
80a7('bum): par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
80a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
80b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
80b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
80b3('bum): pa ni nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
80b4('bum): ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lan cig phyir da'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes darab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
80b5('bum): bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
80b6('bum): rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
80b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa/ rnam par bsgom pa
80b8('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
81a1('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
81a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab
81a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
81a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
81a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid rnam par bsgom pa
81a6('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra rnam par bsgom pa/ 
81a7('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
81a8('bum): pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab
81b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par
81b2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
81b3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81b4('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par
81b5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgo/ ma pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
81b6('bum): lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi
81b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par
81b8('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ sha rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
82a1('bum): 'gas r+dz+dzagan pa'i 'dus rnyeg pa'i na gyim chod rnam par sgom pa gros pa/ shes kyi 'om du na pa pasgoms pa lags/  myur nasa'i 'dus rten pa'i
82a2('bum): gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82a3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg
82a4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shre rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
82a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa gasgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ kha bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na me'i khams rnam par bsku
82a6('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam
82a7('bum): mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi
82a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nam rig pa rnam par
82b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes
82b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
82b3('bum): na skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
82b4('bum): na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa rnam par bsgo dam pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
82b5('bum): lags/ ji ltar na len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na/ srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
82b7('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
82b8('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab
83a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi pa
83a2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje
83a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na btang
83a4('bum): snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ 
83a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
83a6('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
83a7('bum): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
83a8('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dge 'dun rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo ba/ 
83b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gtong ba rjesu dran pa rnam
83b2('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyo ba rjesu
83b3('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
83b4('bum): lags/ ji ltar na 'chi ba rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
83b5('bum): pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar/ na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
83b6('bum): sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
83b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam pa
83b8('bum): bsgom pa bsgom/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
84a1('bum): sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi
84a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgo/ 
84a3('bum): pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gang zag gi 'du shes/ 
84a4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
84a5('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam pa
84a6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
84a7('bum): shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
84a8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
84b1('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi
84b2('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/ 
84b3('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ 
84b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar/ na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnam par
84b5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
84b6('bum): lags/ ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
84b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na smon pa med
84b8('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi/ 
85a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa las
85a2('bum): ji ltar na rtogs pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge
85a3('bum): 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
85a4('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bde ngan pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu daphyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i
85a5('bum): bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
85a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
85a7('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa shes pa
85a8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam
85b1('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltalta na chos shes pa/ 
85b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rjesu 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun
85b3('bum): rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
85b4('bum): ltar na sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes nga rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
85b5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu
85b6('bum): phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
85b7('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
85b8('bum): pashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa
86a1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
86a2('bum): ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86a3('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
86a4('bum): ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji da ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
86a5('bum): ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa
86a6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji
86a7('bum): ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi
86a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa
86b1('bum): nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
86b2('bum): lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
86b3('bum): pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgo ba bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin
86b4('bum): thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs dkyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi
86b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi
86b6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86b7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byams pa chen po rnam
86b8('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
87a1('bum): / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa
87a2('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra
87a3('bum): bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/ 
87a4('bum): ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag das/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgo
87a5('bum): ba bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/ gas/ ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
87a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgyar dgu pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
87a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya ba/ 
87a8('bum): mi bsgom mo// 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig dngos po
87b1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus dngos po yod ces bya
87b2('bum): bar mi bsgom mo// yid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dri dngos po yod ces bya
87b3('bum): par mi bsgom mo// ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod
87b4('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce'i rnam par she
87b5('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig
87b6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
87b7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
87b8('bum): tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
88a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te/ 
88a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chu'i khas dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// me'i khams dngos po yod
88a3('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom/ 
88a4('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi ba sgom mo// ma rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par
88a5('bum): shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba mi bsgom mo// ming dang gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skyemached drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// reg pa dngos
88a6('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sred pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// len pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// srid pa dngos
88a7('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dor ba dngos po
88a8('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po
88b1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// byams pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dga' ba
88b2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam shre/ 
88b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du shes med
88b4('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos rje su dran pa
88b5('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dge 'dun rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 
88b6('bum): gtong ba rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lha rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skye ba rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba
88b7('bum): rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mchi ba rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi rnam pa rjesu dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi rtag pa'i
88b8('bum): 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bdag med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 
89a1('bum): mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces
89a2('bum): bya bar mi bsgom mo// sems can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// srog gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar
89a3('bum): mi bsgom mo// gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skyes bu'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom na/ 
89a4('bum): shed can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// shed bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar
89a5('bum): mi bsgom mo// tshor ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po
89a6('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bde ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar
89a7('bum): mi bsgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod re
89a8('bum): bya bar mi bsgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya
89b1('bum): bar mi bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lam dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
89b2('bum): mo/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya
89b3('bum): bar mi bsgom mo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar
89b4('bum): mi bsgom mo// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pa med cing nga dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mo bsgo/ 
89b5('bum): mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya/ bar mi bsgom mo// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'gog pa
89b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
89b7('bum): mo// kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'gog pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lam shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// zad pa
89b8('bum): shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rje su 'gro ba shes pa
90a1('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dris pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sgra rdza
90a2('bum): bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol te pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
90a3('bum): bsgom mo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90a4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma bsgom mo// nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 
90a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// phyi nang / stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ 
90a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dus ma
90a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 
90a8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang gi
90b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ngo bo nyid stong/ 
90b2('bum): pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mngon par shes pa drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ting nge 'dzin thams cad
90b3('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi 'jigs bzhi dang
90b4('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// so so yang dag par rigapa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sangs// rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
90b5('bum): bsgom mo// byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbom mo// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar
90b6('bum): mi bsgom mo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
90b7('bum): bsgom mo// rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
90b8('bum): bsgom mo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ shes rab kyi
91a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91a2('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can
91a3('bum): la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes
91a4('bum): can la/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'o 'du shes can la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa med de/ 
91a5('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgo ma pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ 
91a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
91a7('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ 
91a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mi dmigs pa nyid bsgom pa medado// 
91b1('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos par 'du shes can la / ngo za nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ dngos po med pa'i nga bcang
91b2('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes
91b3('bum): can la/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa
91b4('bum): med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i/ 
91b5('bum): 'du shes can la/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ snying rje chen po bsgom ba med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ rgyun tu
91b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
91b7('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ rang byang chub bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ lam gyi
91b8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
92a1('bum): pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba bsgom pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la// 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis lnga chags te/ sbyin pa dang / 
92a2('bum): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
92a3('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
92a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid sto/ pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
92a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
92a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
92a7('bum): dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam
92a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la/ 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/ gang mtha'
92b1('bum): gnyis la chags pa de la ni thar pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes la ni/ sbyin pa yang med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ bzod pa yang med/ brtson 'grus kyang med/ bsam
92b2('bum): gtan yang med shes rab kyang med// lam yang med/ ye shes kyang med/ 'thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang med/ gzugs kyang yongasu shes pa
92b3('bum): med/ tshor ba yongasasu shes pa med/ 'du shes kyang yong su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa yang yong su shes pa med/ mig kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba
92b4('bum): yang yong su shes pa med/ sna yang yong su shes pa med/  lce yang yong su shes pa med/ lus kyang yongs su shes dpa med/ yid kyang yongs su shes pa med// gzugs kyang
92b5('bum): yongasu shes pa med/ sgra yang yongasu shes pa med/ dri yang yongasu shes pa med/ ro yang yongasu shes pa med/ reg kyang yongasu shes pa med/ chos kyang yongasu shes pa
92b6('bum): med/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs
92b7('bum): su shes pa med/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yong su shes pa med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yong su shes pa med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
92b8('bum): reg pa yang yongasasu shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongasasu shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongasasu shes pa med/ 
93a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
93a2('bum): yang yongasasu shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongasasu shes pa med// lus kyi 'dus te reg
93a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa med/ sa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chu'i khams
93a4('bum): kyang yongasu shes pa med/ me'i khams kyang yod su shes pa med/ rlung gi khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ na mkha'i khams kyang yong su shwe

93a6('bum): byed kyang yong su shes pa med// rnam par shes pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ ming dang gzugs kyang yong su shes pa med// skye mched kyang yong su shes pa med/ reg pa yang yong su shes pa med// 
93a7('bum): tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa med/ sred pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ len pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ srid pa yang yong su shes pa med// skye ba yang yongasu shes pa med/ rga shi yang yongasu

93b3('bum): pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yong su shes pa med/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongasu she

93b5('bum): dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ gtong ba rje su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ lha rjesu dran pa yang yongasu na/ sa pa med/ skyo ba rjesu dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med
93b6('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjesu dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ mchi ba rje su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med// lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa med// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang
93b7('bum): yongasu shes pa med/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med// dngos po'i
93b8('bum): 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyang yong su shes pa med/ srog gi 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med// skye ba'i
94a1('bum): 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ gso ba'i 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ skyes bu'i 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ gang zag gi 'du shes kyang yongasu shes

94a8('bum): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yong su shes pa med/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa cas gyis ting nge 'dzin kyang yongasu shes pa med/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'o// 
94b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin kyang yongasu shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongasu shes pa med/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i

95b2('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po mchis shes bgyi ba ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po

102a4('bum): stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba/ lta ga la yod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongasu shes
102a5('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos thams cad
102a6('bum): stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
102a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongasu shes pa
102a8('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mngon par shes pa drug yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
102b1('bum): yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi 'jig pa rnams yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ so/ 
102b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yong su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byams pa chen po yongasu shes par
102b3('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ snying rje chen po yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
102b4('bum): bu yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la
102b5('bum): yod/ rang byang chub yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongasu shes bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
102b6('bum): yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ga la yod// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang ga la yod/ phyir mi 'ong / 
102b7('bum): ba'i 'bras yang ga la yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ga la yod/ rang byang chub kyang ga la yod lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ga la yod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ga la yod/ 
102b8('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ga la yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug cu'o// / 
103a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'thun pa'i
103a2('bum): bzod pa yang ma mchis pas 'thob pa lta ga la mchis te ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa lta ga la mchis te ma mchis na/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i
103a3('bum): 'du shes can la/ mthun pa'i bzod pa 'am/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 'am/ rigs kyi sa 'am/ brgyad pa'i sa 'am/ mthong ba'i sa 'am/ bsrabs pa'i sa 'am/ 'dod
103a4('bum): chags dang bral ba'i sa 'am/ byas pa rtogs pa'i das 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ lam bsgre
103a5('bum): pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgrib pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud par ma 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par
103a6('bum): chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spong
103a7('bum): ba'i sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam ma mchis sam bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos kyi bar 'gyur ba gang
103a8('bum): yang skye ba ma mchis na ni ji ltar chos de dag ma bskyed par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
103b1('bum): de de bzhin te/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mngon par rtog pa'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can
103b2('bum): la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la rigs kyi sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la brgyad pa'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes
103b3('bum): can la mthong ba'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la bsrabs pa'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i/ 
103b4('bum): 'du shes can la byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med do// dadangos po med pa'i 'du shes can la rang sangs rgyas dkyis med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la byung
103b5('bum): chub sems dpa'i sa med do// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyis med do// dngos po med pa/ 'i 'du shes can la lam bsgom pa gang la rten cing nyon mongs
103b6('bum): pa gang gis bsgribs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi
103b7('bum): 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
103b8('bum): pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po/ 
104a1('bum): / mchis par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis sam/ gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du shes su 'du shes pa dang / 
104a2('bum): 'du byed du 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / mig du 'du shes pa dang / rna bar 'du shes pa dang / snar 'du shes pa dang / lcer 'du shes pa dang / lus su 'du shes pa dang
104a3('bum): yid du 'du shes pa dang / gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / sgrar 'du shes pa dang / drir 'du shes pa dang / ror 'du shes pa dang / reg tu 'du shes pa dang / chos su 'du shes pa dang / mig gi rna
104a4('bum): par shes par 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / 
104a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi rna ma par shes par 'du shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus reg par 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes
104a6('bum): pa dang / sku'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus
104a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
104a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / sa'i kham su 'du shes pa
104b1('bum): dang tshugangs su 'du shes pa dang / me'i khamasu 'du shes pa dang / rlung gi kham su 'du shes pa dang / rnam pa'i khams du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'du shes pa dang / 'ang/ 
104b2('bum): chag su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod chags spang bar 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang / khre sdang spang bar 'du shes pa dang / gaN+DI mug du 'du shes pa dang / gti mug spang bar 'dra/ 
104b3('bum): shes pa dang / ma rig par shes pa dang / ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed du 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / 
104b4('bum): rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ming dang gzu dgas su 'du shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs spang bar/ 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug du 'du shes pa dang / skye
104b5('bum): mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / reg par 'du she sa pa dang / reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba ra 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sred
104b6('bum): par 'du shes pa dang / sred pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / len par 'du shes pa dang / len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / srid par 'du shes pa dang / srid pa spang bar 'du shes
104b7('bum): pa dang / skye bar 'du shes pa dang / skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rga sha 'du shes pa dang / rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang / 
104b8('bum): mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang / kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang // 
105a1('bum): kun 'byung ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'gog par 'du shes pa dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya bar 'du shes pa dang / lam du 'du shes pa dang / lam bsgom pa
105a2('bum): 'du shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes pa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/ bcom ldan
105a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la yang dngos po yod par
105a4('bum): 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po med par 'du shes pa med do// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
105a5('bum): chen po'i 'thun pa'i bzod pa'o// gang la dngos po yod/ par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes/ pa med pa de nyid ni/ lam bsgom pa'o// gang la dngos po
105a6('bum): yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa mod pa de nyid ni 'bras bu'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni/ dngos po med pa ste/ mngon par rtog/ 
105a7('bum): pa yang dngos po med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar chos
105a8('bum): thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
105b1('bum): sangs rgyas par gyur te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ chos thams cad la mngar sgyur ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
105b2('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces ba kA stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
105b3('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par rtog pa
105b4('bum): dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongasu dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig du gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / 
105b5('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs gnaso// dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ 
105b6('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong zhing 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
105b7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs zhing / snga mi'i yid bde ba dang // mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ 
105b8('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pas nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi/ 
106a1('bum): mtshan ma bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gi snyems par ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyur te/ de ltar na ngas bsam
106a2('bum): gtan de dag rnam pa yongasu dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go// de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/ shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya// 
106a3('bum): lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya'o// pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya// sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa shes pa mngon du
106a4('bum): bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya// 'o na kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan
106a5('bum): mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/ ri myong bar ma gyur/ dmigs par ma gyur te/ mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag na mkha' lta bur yang dag par
106a6('bum): rjes su dran pas mnyam par gzhag ste// de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di
106a7('bum): ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
106a8('bum): bzhon du yongasu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
106b1('bum): ldan par gyur/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/ sems can rnams phung po gsum
106b2('bum): du lung bstan par gyur to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
106b3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de
106b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
106b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
106b6('bum): kyis snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis
106b7('bum): par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid
106b8('bum): yod pa'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnam
107a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams/ 
107a2('bum): la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas
107a3('bum): dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas
107a4('bum): par gyur to// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongasu dang ste sems kyi rgyud dag/ cig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge
107a5('bum): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can pas gtan gnyi sa pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes
107a6('bum): bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i
107a7('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal
107a8('bum): yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod
107b1('bum): dengo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
107b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po med de/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po meng pa'i/ 
107b3('bum): ngo bo nyid yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid thugasu chud de/ bla na med pa
107b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
107b5('bum): chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa/ lngas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
107b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyan/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyod pa dang
107b7('bum): mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan tu bgyi ba/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis spyod pa
107b8('bum): dang / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
108a1('bum): chen pos/ thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa
108a2('bum): ngag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dag las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po
108a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos dpo med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa thams cad dngos po
108a5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chu dun/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang med do zhes bya bar thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
108a6('bum): chen po des/ ci ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang sangs rgyas
108a7('bum): rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang
108a8('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
108b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyang rung // gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyis ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 
108b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la/ spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
108b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste// mthar gyis spyod pa dang // mthar/ 
108b4('bum): gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shing / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i
108b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur/ pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis/ nan tan tu rtsom mo// de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
108b6('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
108b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu
108b8('bum): gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do// sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin
109a1('bum): pa des skying ba chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te/ skyon dang ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongasu gtong bar byed de/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ 
109a2('bum): skom 'dod pa la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos/ spos 'dod pa la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/ 
109a3('bum): gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / baM
109a4('bum): rlur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul yongasu gtong ba nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/ de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims
109a5('bum): kyi phung po yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par/ byed do// me'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu
109a6('bum): thob par byed do// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis/ rnam
109a7('bum): par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba des/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu
109a8('bum): thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
109b1('bum): kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas/ sems can rnams yong su smin par byas
109b2('bum): nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so
109b3('bum): sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigasu med
109b4('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do// rab da 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o cha na po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang
109b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs brjod do// gzhan
109b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob pa/ 
109b7('bum): byed do// de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'gong ngo do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god
109b8('bum): do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam pa
110a1('bum): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi
110a2('bum): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs
110a3('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi// 
110a4('bum): 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sem das can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
110a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi mthar gyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do// rab
110a6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
110a7('bum): phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de bzod
110a8('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongasu tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// 
110b1('bum): rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par rnam
110b2('bum): ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
110b3('bum): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
110b4('bum): med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas nas/ rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams
