212b2('bum): grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// zhes bya bar shes par bya ste gang de ltar shes
212b3('bum): nas/ sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// 
212b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// brtson 'grus da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
212b5('bum): pa las phyir mi ldog go/ des pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// tshad med pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// gzugs
212b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
212b7('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dbang po lnga yongasu rdzogs par byed do// stobs lnga yongasu rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
212b8('bum): pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs
213a1('bum): par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas
213a2('bum): stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs
213a3('bum): par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mi dmigs pa stong
213a4('bum): pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
213a5('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge'adzin yongasu rdzogs par byed do// smon pa med pa'i ting
213a6('bum): 'dzin yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga
213a7('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongasu rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed
213a8('bum): do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// byams pa chen po yongasu rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su
213b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yong su rdzogs par byed do// de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smon pa las byung ba
213b2('bum): rnams la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de
213b3('bum): dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzim cha dang / bsnyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bskur byed de/ longs spyod dang / spyod pa thams
213b4('bum): cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// des na/ sems can gang sbyin pas yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin dpas yongasu sdud do// gang tshul khrims kyis yongasu bsdu ba de
213b5('bum): dag kyang tshul khrims kyis yongasu bsdud do// gang bzod pas yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yong su sdud do// gang brtson 'grus kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus
213b6('bum): kyis yongasu sdud do// gang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu sdud do// gang shes rab kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongasu sdud do// gang nang
213b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
213b8('bum): yang su bsdu pa de dag kyang kyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yangs sdud do// gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang chen po stong nga
214a1('bum): kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po song pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis so
214a2('bum): sdud do// gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus ma byas
214a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
214a4('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ stong pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang dor ba med pa/  stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong/ 
214a5('bum): pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sa yong su sdud do// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis
214a6('bum): yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
214a7('bum): sdud do// gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu sdud do// gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang
214a8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
214b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar
214b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasasu sdud do// gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu bsdud do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
214b3('bum): rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang stobs
214b4('bum): rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag
214b5('bum): rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang lam gyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongasu sdud do// gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de
214b6('bum): dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang tshad med
214b7('bum): pa rnams kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang
214b8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasasu sdud do// gang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis
215a1('bum): yong su sdud do// gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis
215a2('bum): yongasu sdud do// gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
215a3('bum): med pas yong su sdud do// gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge
215a4('bum): 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnam/ sa kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
215a5('bum): kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong sa rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyiyongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang / mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongasu
215a6('bum): sdud do// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yong su sdud do// gang byams pa chen pos yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang byams pa chen pos
215a7('bum): yongasu sdud do// gang snying rje chen pos yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yong su sdud do// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
215a8('bum): rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongasu sdud do// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongasu bsdu ba de dag
215b1('bum): kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongasu sdud do// gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongasu sdud do// gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu
215b2('bum): ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang rang byang chub kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis yong su sdud do// gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasasu bsdu ba de dag kyang lam
215b3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yong su sdud do// de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang
215b4('bum): dang gang gis yongasu bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dag gis yongasu sdud do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas 'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor ba'i
215b5('bum): sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/ de sems can rnams kyi don du mo dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/ phun sum tsho gas pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongasu sdud do// de chos
215b6('bum): thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes
215b7('bum): kyang de la mi gnas so// dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so// rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par byas te/ nyan thos
215b8('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan
216a1('bum): nyid med par shes pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
216a2('bum): mtshan nyid med par shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan// 
216a3('bum): nyid med par shes so// nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan
216a4('bum): nyid med par shes so// chen po steng pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// / 
216a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid
216a6('bum): med par shes so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// rang
216a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
216a8('bum): mtshan nyid med par shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan
216b1('bum): nyid med par shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// dbang po rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag
216b2('bum): rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// bsam gtan rnams
216b3('bum): mtshan nyid med par shes so// tshad med pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid
216b4('bum): med par shes so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
216b5('bum): pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// ting nge 'dzin/ rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// gzungs kyi sgo
216b6('bum): rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// so so yang dag par rig
216b7('bum): pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// byams pa chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so// snying rje chen po mtshan nyid med par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan nyid
216b8('bum): med par shes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid med par shes so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid
217a1('bum): med par shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid med
217a2('bum): par shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
217a3('bum): rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i
217a4('bum): phung po lnga la gnas/ mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i/ phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i daphung po lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len/ 
217a5('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar le zha ba'i phung po lnga la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
217a6('bum): phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po la rmi lam lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes
217a7('bum): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga mig yor lta bur shes// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lnga/ 
217a8('bum): bur shes// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas/ 
217b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/ ma zhig pa/ ma ral pa/ skyon med pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ nyams pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu
217b2('bum): rdzogs pa/ 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa med pa/ lam gyi khongs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i
217b3('bum): brda' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi spyad pa
217b4('bum): tshul khrims srung ngo // de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang da skal ba mnyam pa 'o ma/ bram ze che zhing mtho bo'i
217b5('bum): rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye b.rabya'o zhe'am/ rgyal phran nam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
217b6('bum): rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam/ 
217b7('bum): 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong
217b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyoms pa med
218a1('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i
218a2('bum): chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
218a3('bum): kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims
218a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongasu rdzogs par byasadanas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe/ mi skye ba'i chos la
218a5('bum): bzod pa thob ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lngar rab thob nas gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga baH/ 
218a6('bum): la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang
218a7('bum): yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu 'dzin to// de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba nas 'khor yang 'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na sprul pa ni 'gro
218a8('bum): pa 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ sdod pa'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ zhal ba byed kyang de la/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba'am/ sdod pa'am/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba yang mi dmigs te/ de sems can rnams kyi don
218b1('bum): kyang byed do// sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi migs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu ni ba zhes bya
218b2('bum): babla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can chad med pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang
218b3('bum): g.yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/ des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pa mdzad do// phung po ma lus
218b4('bum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
218b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 
218b6('bum): 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dngos po gang yang dmigasu med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam/ sems can du gdags
218b7('bum): pa yong mi dmigs la/ sems can rnams kyi don yang byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ mtshan nyid med pa'i
218b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de yongasu rdzogs pas/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad khongasu chud par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
219a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mog yor lta bu dang / 
219a2('bum): sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar
219a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
219a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol ba tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos khong du chud pa'i bzod
219a5('bum): pa'o// de la nyam su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'du ga gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
219a6('bum): drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba 'am/ mi snyan par brjod cing / ma klas pa'i tshig brlang bzer bar gyur tam/ rdod dbyug dang / mtshon chas gardegs sam/ btab
219a7('bum): kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'dod pas/ sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa
219a8('bum): bskyed par mi bya ste/ phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/ 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi bskyed kyi/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyi phung po
219b1('bum): dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying brtse ba bskyed par bya'o// byams pa dang ldan te snying rje bar gyur nas/ rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes
219b2('bum): bya'o// de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na/ bdag la gshe ba 'am/ mi snyan par brjod pa 'am/ ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba
219b3('bum): 'am/ rdo dbyug gis rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa lta su zhog yod de/ 'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu gsog gsob rag las pa/ nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang / sems can dang / sreg dang / 
219b4('bum): 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang bral ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongasu rtog pa las byung ba yin na/ 
219b5('bum): bdag la gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / ma kla/ sa pa'i tshig brlang ba zer ba dang / rdo dbyug gis rdeg/ cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/ bdag gi ngo bo nyid
219b6('bum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ de ltar rnam par rtog par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de de ltar yong su rtog cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
219b7('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa des/ mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes
219b8('bum): bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de la spang ba ni ci mchis/ ye shes ni ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mo skye'o// de gang gis
220a1('bum): shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa des mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi skye ba'i
220a2('bum): chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag du bgyi ba ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
220a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes
220a4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub semangs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// phyir mi 'ong dba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang
220a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// 
220a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang / byang
220a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas zil gyis gnon te/ 
220a8('bum): de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ de yongasu rdzogs
220b1('bum): pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes bde lnga dang mi 'bral ba yin/ 
220b2('bum): de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa yin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed pa yin/ de sems can rnams yongs smin par byas/ sangs rgyas
220b3('bum): kyi zhing yong su dag par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
220b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
220b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu
220b6('bum): lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nyo bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par smra ba ste/ phyogs dang phyogs
220b7('bum): mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
220b8('bum): dag par byed do// de lus kyi brtson 'grus des/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas nas// theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
221a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// des sems kyi brtson
221a2('bum): 'grus zag pa med pa lam gyo yan lag tu gyur pa lam gyi khongasu chud pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / 
221a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par
221a4('bum): thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med dpa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jugapa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang // mthar gyis/ 
221a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs bcu dang / mo 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
221a6('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu 'dus pa yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
221a7('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ de yongasu rdzogs pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
221a8('bum): ba thams cad spangs nas/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// kun tu snang ba thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor bskor bar
221b1('bum): 'gyuraro// de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun nas g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun nas
221b2('bum): 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro// 
221b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung shing dbyangs grags par gyur pa'i steng/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
221b4('bum): can gang ji snyed kyi thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson
221b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs
221b6('bum): par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar
221b7('bum): len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha
221b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i
222a1('bum): phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyum lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
222a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa
222a3('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// snying
222a4('bum): rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// gtang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
222a5('bum): gnas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs/ te gnas so// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye ba ra bsgrubs te gnas so// 'du shes med 'du shes med min
222a6('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
222a7('bum): sgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang 'thun mong ba'i ting nge
222a8('bum): 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing nye bar sgrubs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin
222b1('bum): de dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mtshan nyid med pa dang
222b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i chos kyang dngos po med pa'i chos
222b3('bum): kyi ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/ de ro myong bar byed pa med pas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang / gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i
222b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang mi dmigs/ gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gang gis snyoms/ par 'jug pa de yang mi dmigs so// de mi dmigs pas
222b5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de sa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yong su 'da'o// 
222b6('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang rang sangs
222b7('bum): rgyas kyi sa las yongasu 'da' ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong pa nyid la shin tu
222b8('bum): bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid
223a1('bum): la shin tu bslabs pa dang // don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu
223a2('bum): bslabs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa/ 
223a3('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / mi dmigs pa
223a4('bum): stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa 'di la shin tu bslabs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po med
223a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi
223a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de yang stong pa
223a7('bum): nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongasu shin tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
223a8('bum): par 'jug go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor
223b1('bum): dmigs pa thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no// mi dmigs pa thams cad ni sbyin med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags mi dmigs pa ni gang lags
223b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rab
223b3('bum): 'byor 'du shes ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni byang chub
223b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// rna ba dang sgra ni byang chub sems
223b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// sna dang dron byang cu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// U/ dang ro ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
223b6('bum): dmigs pa'o// lus dang reg pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o// mig gi rnam par
223b7('bum): shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
223b8('bum): pa ni dmigs pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
224a1('bum): tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// lus kyi rnam
224a2('bum): par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te/ 
224a3('bum): reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// sa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o// chu'i khams ni dmigs pa'o// me'i khams ni dmigs pa'o// rlung gi
224a4('bum): khams ni dmigs pa'o// na mkha'i khams ni dmigs pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o ma rig pa ni dmi gas pa'o// 'du byed ni dmigs pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni/ 
224a5('bum): dmigs pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni dmigs pa'o// skye mche/ da drug ni dmigs pa'o// reg pa ni dmigs pa'o// tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o// sred pa ni dmigs pa'o// len pa ni
224a6('bum): dmigs pa'o// srid pa ni dmigs pa'o// skye ba ni dmigs pa'o// rga shi ni dmigs pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// bzod pa'i pha/ 
224a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni
224a8('bum): dmigs pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni
224b1('bum): dmigs pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs
224b2('bum): pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// mi dmigs pa
224b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
224b4('bum): ni dmigs pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams pa ni dmigs pa'o// / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// dbang po rnam ngas ni dmigs pa'o// stobs rnams ni dmigs pa'o// byang chub
224b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni dmigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// bsam gtan rnams
224b6('bum): ni dmigs pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dmigs pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
224b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu ni dmigs pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni dmigs pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni dmigs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
224b8('bum): rnams ni dmigs pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dmigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dmigs pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dmigs pa'o// so so yang dag par rig bzhi ni
225a1('bum): dmigs pa'o// byams pa chen po ni dmigs pa'o// snying rje chen po ni dmigs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dmigs pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
225a2('bum): 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmigs pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// rang byang chub ni dmigs pa'o// 
225a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dmigs pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs pa ste skyon no// rab 'byor skyon med pa nyid ni gang la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
225a4('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos dang / 
225a5('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
225a6('bum): pa dang rna mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi
225a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
225a8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / ma'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / 
225b1('bum): namakha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / 
225b2('bum): sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
225b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
225b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa dang / 
225b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos tham/ sa cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
225b6('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
225b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
225b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
226a1('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa dgung / rnam pa thar ba'i ni stong pa nyid dang / ma tshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes parnams
226a2('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzags pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
226a3('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / 
226a4('bum): rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos de dag gi brjodadapa yang dmig su med pa'o// / shes rab kyi
226a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya don drug pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni
226a6('bum): brjod du med pa'o// tshor ba la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// 'du shes la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa ni brjod du med pa'o// 'du byed la
226a7('bum): rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// mig la rang bzhin med de/ gang la
226a8('bum): rang bzhin med pa da ni brjod du med pa'o// rna ba la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// sna la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// 
226b1('bum): lce la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du rnyed pa'o// lus la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// yid la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang

226b3('bum): rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa da ni brjod du med pa'o// rol rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// reg la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa
226b4('bum): de ni brjod du med pa'o// chos la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// mig gi/ rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa

226b6('bum): la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/ 
226b7('bum): gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rang bzhin med de/
