285a7('bum): sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na
285a8('bum): mtho ba mi mnga' ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
285b1('bum): rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gnol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ 
285b2('bum): rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu dben pa'i
285b3('bum): chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad la sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa 'i// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
285b4('bum): mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang dpo'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
285b5('bum): 'das rnams ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar na mkha' las bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi'i khyu mchog ste/ 
285b6('bum): khyu mchog gi stabasu bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogasu bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang rnams ni/ blta na mdzes
285b7('bum): pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma g.yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// 
285b8('bum): tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ skra shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ skra shin tu spangs
286a1('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku dang gsung
286a2('bum): dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'dzem pa yin/ 
286a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// chos dang
286a4('bum): 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga/ yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing
286a5('bum): mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs
286a6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs
286a7('bum): mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
286a8('bum): rnams ni/ yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ skra shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag
286b1('bum): dang / nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab
286b2('bum): rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'khor
286b3('bum): ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin
286b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ dasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zab mo shin/ 
286b5('bum): tu thugasu chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcwa ma ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'thun par 'dzin pa'islob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogasu 'khyil pa
286b6('bum): ye ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 
286b7('bum): thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba
286b8('bum): mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu
287a1('bum): 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas/ dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ 
287a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ro mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bzod pa'i chos yangs pa
287a3('bum): ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'chal ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas
287a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzugs brnyan 'jig rten dang thams cad du skye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs pa snyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 
287a5('bum): 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu/ 'jam pa yon/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu
287a6('bum): srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams ni/ chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs
287a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brag gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
287a8('bum): 'das rnams ni/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyam su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyam su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
287b1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche/ 
287b2('bum): brno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// 
287b3('bum): sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rim gyis mngon par rtog pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems
287b4('bum): mche bo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom/ ldan 'das rnams ni/ shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la dbazhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa
287b5('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsu nga ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// sangs
287b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag
287b7('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lha dang / 
287b8('bum): lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog mig dkar gnag 'byas shing / pad+mo'i mdab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar
288a1('bum): gnag 'byes shing pad+mo'i mdab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan
288a2('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni// skyon
288a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis/ sems snum par gyur pa'i skyo bo 'dul ba
288a4('bum): ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bco dam ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan/ 
288a5('bum): shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal bste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
288a6('bum): 'das rnams ni/ sems can bsam pa mnyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongasu
288a7('bum): byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa
288a8('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yul gyi bu ba
288b1('bum): rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ba dang bsgos pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbus stug/ 
288b2('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugasu chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu ma 'khrugs
288b3('bum): pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu mi 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na/ brlang ba'i gsung dang yongasu bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
288b4('bum): ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me rtog gis skye bo 'thun pa dbasgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bco dam ldan 'das rnams ni/ phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u
288b5('bum): dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
288b6('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi
288b7('bum): sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
288b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya brgyad cu pa/ 
289a1('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
289a2('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
289a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems
289a4('bum): can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems
289a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can
289a6('bum): rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin po drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
289a7('bum): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de na bya bas sems can rnam
289a8('bum): sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b1('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma
289b2('bum): 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b3('bum): po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
289b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'do dmas shing 'di skad ston to// rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog// yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ 
289b5('bum): yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyi sa nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas bar gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang
289b6('bum): bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams
289b7('bum): cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to// 
289b8('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi gcig gi nang du yi ge/ 
290a1('bum): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyisu yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon
290a2('bum): bar bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
290a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang / 
290a4('bum): rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i
290a5('bum): chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
290a6('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yong shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ 
290a7('bum): chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
290a8('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
290b1('bum): la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod/ 
290b2('bum): ba dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon po med pa'i tong nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par
290b3('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
290b4('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen dpo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 
290b5('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ 
290b6('bum): de la ni sems can mi dmigs te// sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmig so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
290b7('bum): tshor ba dmi gsum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'du shes dmi gsum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'du byed dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi
290b8('bum): dmigs pas rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mi dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba dmig su ma mchis/ 
291a1('bum): so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lce dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus dmigs
291a2('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas yid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sgra dmigasu ma mchiso// / 
291a3('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas dri dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas ro dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas reg dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
291a4('bum): chos dmi gsu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mig/ gi rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma
291a5('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i rnam par shes/ pa dmi gsu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pa/ sa lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigasum mchis so// sems/ 
291a6('bum): can mi dmigs pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi
291a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma
291a8('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can
291b1('bum): mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can ma
291b2('bum): dmigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can
291b3('bum): mi dmigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// 
291b4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dgyis tshor ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// 
291b5('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ chu'i khams dmigasu ma mchis pas/ sems can mi dmigs pas/ me'i khams dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
291b6('bum): rlung gi khams dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ na mkha'i khams dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mo dmigs pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigasum
291b7('bum): mchiso// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ma rig pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du byed dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam par shes pa/ 
291b8('bum): dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ming dang gzugs dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ skye mched drug dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can
292a1('bum): mi dmigs pas/ reg pa migasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sred pa dmi gsum
292a2('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ len pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ srid pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ skye ba dmyigs
292a3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rga shi dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmag
292a4('bum): pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasas ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bzod pa'i ba ro// la tu phyin pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi
292a5('bum): dmigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ba sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasu ma mchis so// 
292a6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmig su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
292a7('bum): bas/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
292a8('bum): dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmi gsu ma mchis so// 
292b1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
292b2('bum): pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmi gsum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
292b3('bum): pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ chos thams
292b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmi dgasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 
292b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 
292b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dran
292b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yang dag par spong ba dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
292b8('bum): dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dbang po lnga dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ stobs lnga dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi
293a1('bum): dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigasu ma mchis so// 
293a2('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshad med
293a3('bum): pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigasum
293a4('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mthar gyis gan das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
293a5('bum): pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ smon pa med pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mngon par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis// 
293a6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ ting nge 'dzin dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzungs kyi sgo dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ de bzhin
293a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ so so yang dag
293a8('bum): par rig pa bzhi dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ byams pa chen po dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ snying rje chen po dmigasu ma mchis// 
293b1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigasu ma mchis so// 
293b2('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigasu ma mchis so// sems
293b3('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rang byang chub dmigasum mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lam gyi rnam pa
293b4('bum): shes pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmi/ gas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmig/ su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi chen
293b5('bum): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dpe byang bzang po ba rgyad cu dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can dmigs su
293b6('bum): ma mchis pa la ni/ sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// 
293b7('bum): mig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma
293b8('bum): mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// chog gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i
294a1('bum): rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// 
294a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// mig
294a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
294a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'du te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// sa'i khams ma mchi so// 
294a5('bum): chu'i khams ma mchis so// me'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// na mkha'i khams ma mchis// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// ma rig pa ma mchis
294a6('bum): so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// 
294a7('bum): len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchis so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha
294a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid
294b1('bum): ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus
294b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa
294b3('bum): nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos
294b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma/ mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// / 
294b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po lnga ma mchis so// stobs lnga ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma
294b6('bum): mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so// 
294b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// stong pa nyid
294b8('bum): ma mchis so// mtshan ma med pa ma mchis so// smon pa med pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma
295a1('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis// 
295a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchiso// / 
295a3('bum): dgra bcom pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis so// mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
295a4('bum): ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
295a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga las
295a6('bum): mchi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du
295a7('bum): rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa
295a8('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// thog ma dang tha
295b1('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
295b2('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong bzhi rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du
295b3('bum): rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par
295b4('bum): bya'o// bdon pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par ro bya'o// srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'gro ba stong pa
295b5('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// gsob stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gang zag stong / pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shad can stong pa nyid du rig
295b6('bum): par bya'o// shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// / 
295b7('bum): kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
295b8('bum): mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa
296a1('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam
296a2('bum): yan lag brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
296a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong po nyid
296a4('bum): du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / de mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du ri ga par bya'o// mngon par shes pa lnga stong pa nyid du rig
296a5('bum): par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad stong pa nyid du rig/ par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa
296a6('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
296a7('bum): snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
296a8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong po nyid du rig par bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang
296b1('bum): byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa
296b2('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
296b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid du de dag la yang mi
296b4('bum): 'jug pa de ltar ston to// des de ltar mthong nas/ chos tham sa cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang yang la bru ges par mi byed/ gnyi su mi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta
296b5('bum): ba bzhin du yang ston pa byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems can la la
296b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ lo la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ 
296b7('bum): la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/ la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la
296b8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dran pa nye bar gzhog pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/ la la rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa/ 
297a1('bum): bzhi la spyor/ la la dbang po lnga la spyod/ la la stobs lnga la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/ lal 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 
297a2('bum): la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa la sbyor/ la la rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor/ la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/ la la rnam
297a3('bum): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/ la la gzung kyi skye
297a4('bum): thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul sbyor/ la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la na sbyor/ la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ 
297a5('bum): la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
297a6('bum): sbyor la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyoral la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thad
297a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du semos/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
297a8('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci
297b1('bum): log rnams las yongasu bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol
297b2('bum): ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mig ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma
297b3('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ sna ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ sgra ma bcings ma
297b4('bum): grol ba/ dri ma bcings ma grol ba/ ro ma bcings ma grol rab/ reg ma bcings ma grol ba/ chos rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
297b5('bum): ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus
297b6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma
297b7('bum): grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings
297b8('bum): ma grol ba/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
298a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bci
298a2('bum): ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ me'i khams ma bcings/ 
298a3('bum): ma grol ba/ rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol
298a4('bum): ba 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par she/ sa pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ ming dang gzugs ma dbacings ma grol ba/ skye mched drug ma bcings ma
298a5('bum): grol ba/ reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ len pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ srid pa ma bcings ma
298a6('bum): grol ba/ skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol
298a7('bum): ba/ bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba// 
298a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma
298b1('bum): grol ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ga/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma
298b2('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings
298b3('bum): ma grol ba/ dor ba med pa stong po nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ga chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid
298b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
298b5('bum): bcings ma grol ba// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ yang dag par
298b6('bum): spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub
298b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam
298b8('bum): gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol pa/ tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar pa
299a1('bum): rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
299a2('bum): dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings
299a3('bum): ma grol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
299a4('bum): byams pa chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/ snying rje che dan po ma bcings ma grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dam 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/ rgyun
299a5('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
299a6('bum): rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma
299a7('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ nyid gang yin pa de/ gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol
299a8('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol
299b1('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mig ma yin no// rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba ma
299b2('bum): yin no// sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna ma yin no// lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lce ma yin no// lus kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
299b3('bum): delus ma yin no// yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa da/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i ma bcings
299b4('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sgra ma yin no// dro'i ma dbacings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dri ma yin no// da ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ro ma
299b5('bum): yin no// reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi ma bcings ma grolab nyid gang yin pa de/ chos ma yin no// mig gi rnam
299b6('bum): par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i
299b7('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcing
299b8('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang ya ni ba de/ lus kyi rnam par shes
300a1('bum): pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings
300a2('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg
300a3('bum): pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi
300a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yid kyi
300a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid grang yin pa de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
300a6('bum): yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
300a7('bum): tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
300a8('bum): ba de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
300b1('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi ma
300b2('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ chu'i khams ma yin no// me'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba
300b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de/ me'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// na mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
300b4('bum): de/ na mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i ma
300b5('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i
300b6('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ming dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched
300b7('bum): drug gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i ma bcings ma
300b8('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ len pa
301a1('bum): ma yin no// srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'im
301a2('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol po nyid gang yin pa de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi
301a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po'am bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bzod
301a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bsam
301a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma
301a6('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings
301a7('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma
301a8('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam/ 
301b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pade/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 
301b2('bum): ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis bcings ma grol ba nyid ga
301b3('bum): yin pa de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
301b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
301b5('bum): yin pa de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
301b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
301b7('bum): yin pa de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa
301b8('bum): nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de/ dngos po
302a1('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// 
302a2('bum): yang dag par stong pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
302a3('bum): de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
302a4('bum): ba de/ stabs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam
302a5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yi// na ba de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma
302a6('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad
302a7('bum): med pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ tshad med pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
302a8('bum): ba de/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin/ 
302b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
302b2('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par
302b3('bum): shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams/ 
302b4('bum): ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba denyid gang yin pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ma bcings ma grol ba
302b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sa ma yin no// mi 'jig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// 
302b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// byams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bams
302b7('bum): ba chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
302b8('bum): yin pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// / 
303a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yan cig phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma
303a2('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// rang byang chub kyi
303a3('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa do// rang byang chub ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// bla
303a4('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings/ ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
303a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed ni shin tu rnam par
303a6('bum): dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lha ni shin tu rnam
303a7('bum): par dag pa'o// lus ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sgra ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dri ni shin tu rnam par
303a8('bum): dag pa'o// ro ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// reg ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i rnam
303b1('bum): par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu/ 
303b2('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
303b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg
303b4('bum): pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam
303b5('bum): bar dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
303b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i khams ni shin tu rnam
303b7('bum): par dag pa'o// chu'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dga'o// ma'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rlung gi khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// na mkha'i khams ni shin tu rnam par
303b8('bum): dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ma rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam
304a1('bum): par dag pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shin tu/ 
304a2('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// sred pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// len pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rga shi ni shin
304a3('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu
304a4('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
304a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// nang stong panyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi stong pa nyidani shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu/ 
304a6('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag ba'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
304a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// thog ma dang tha
304a8('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
304b1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam
304b2('bum): par dag pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par
304b3('bum): dag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dbang po lnga ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// stobs lngan
304b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag pa dun ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
304b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu
304b6('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgya dran shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
304b7('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag
304b8('bum): pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//  'jigs pa bzhin shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
305a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs
305a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
305a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang byang chub ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu
305a4('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
305a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / sems can du mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po ni// chos thams cad mi dmigs
305a6('bum): pa la/ de mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
305a7('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
305a8('bum): sna stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs stong pa nyid
305b1('bum): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / re stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos
305b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
305b3('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
305b4('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus
305b5('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dusate reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
305b6('bum): yid kyi 'das te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
305b7('bum): ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
305b8('bum): tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i
306a1('bum): khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams stong pa
306a2('bum): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / na mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
306a3('bum): dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug stong
306a4('bum): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa tshul dang / sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnos pa'i tshul dang / 
306a5('bum): len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
306a6('bum): tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
306a7('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
306a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi gan+da
306b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus pas stong pa nyid mi gan+da
306b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang
306b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi gan
306b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang
306b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi
306b6('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang
306b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
306b8('bum): tshul dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
307a1('bum): tshul dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar
307a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa dang / mtshan me med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi
307a3('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong
307a4('bum): ba nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par ri/ ga pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
307a5('bum): snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
307a6('bum): bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'drab stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom
307a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thad
307a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la
307b1('bum): gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas/ gzhan gyis dngos po la/ gzhan gyis dngos po mi
307b2('bum): gnaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thad dmig su med de/ gang dmig su med pa de ni gang la yang mi gnas so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
307b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang
307b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyadas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
307b5('bum): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
307b6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang / chos nyid de rje su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rje su rtogs pas kyang / sen rnams la chos ston te/ de yang chos rnams kyi
307b7('bum): chos nyid las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i
307b8('bum): rang bzhin med do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya gyi gcig pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
308a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan
308a2('bum): la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang bzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
308a3('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la
308a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa dar shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de
308a5('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
308a6('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna yang gzhan la/ chos kyi
308a7('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
308a8('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags/ lus kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyang gzhan la/ 
308b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
308b2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sgra yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dri yang gzhan la
308b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig legs sam/ ro yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
308b4('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ reg kyang gzhan da la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzha/ na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chos
308b5('bum): kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lag sa sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi
308b6('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang
308b7('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
308b8('bum): lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
309a1('bum): yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi/ 
309a2('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
309a3('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
309a4('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzha na la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang da gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 
309a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'imatha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te
309a6('bum): reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de shin nyid kyang gzhag yang dag pa'i mtha' yang bzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid
309a7('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ 
309a8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
309b1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags so// 
309b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
309b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan
309b4('bum): la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang drag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ so khams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
309b5('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyi nga gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
309b6('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ me'i khams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhon/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rlung gi khams kyang
309b7('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ na mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
309b8('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang / 
310a1('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ ma rig pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags// 'du byed kyang gzhan la
310a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ 
310a3('bum): yang dag po'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 
310a4('bum): skye mched kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ dede bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings
310a5('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhon/ yang
310a6('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sred pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ len pa yang gzhan
310a7('bum): la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ srid pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
310a8('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ skye ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rga shi yang
310b1('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
310b2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
310b3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
310b4('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
310b5('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ bsam gtan gyis pa rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
310b6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
310b7('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyi stong
310b8('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos
311a1('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi
311a2('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
311a3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
311a4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang // gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
311a5('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
311a6('bum): zhig lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ thog
311a7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa
311a8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings
311b1('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang
311b2('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
311b3('bum): ba'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
311b4('bum): zhig lags sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
311b5('bum): lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la ches/ kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 
311b6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dran pa nye bar
311b7('bum): bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang
311b8('bum): gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang
312a1('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
312a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
312a3('bum): sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'phags
312a4('bum): pa'i la mo yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
